title: Sign up as a host
text: Register to be a host on our webiste and share your charger without any sign-up fees.

section.title: Future-proof business
section.content: For those looking to establish a competitive advantage, installing electric car charging points now is a smart future proofing move.

section.title: Customers stay longer
section.content: Retail businesses motivate customers to stay and look for longer with straightforward parking facilities that can at the same time provide charging benefits.
